channel.title: Is there any way to use 2D array of Lat,long and place it as polygon on any open street map?
channel.description:
I wanted to use the array of lat, long as follows
![image|203x120](upload://rR9Sn7jyYtU0dBcMnl80EMkwtin.png)
to be able to view on map not as marker but as polygon lines connecting these lines to form a closed area as follow.
![image|231x218](upload://nJagwmRSqfxvb6xi5jTsrtW5jaQ.jpeg)
If this feature is a pending one then is there any other open source tool that connects with redash to do the same ?
